---
layout: default
title:  Record in ReScript
date:   2021-03-25
parent: rescript
---

```javascript
// ./Animal.js

let Animal = {
  name: 'Empush'
}

module.exports = Animal;
```

```rescript
// ./Animal.res

// record is immutable
type animal = {
  name: string
}

@bs.module external animal: animal = "./Animal";

Js.log(animal.name)
```

```javascript
// Generated by ReScript, PLEASE EDIT WITH CARE
'use strict';

var Animal = require("./Animal.js");

var animal = Animal;

console.log(animal.name);

exports.animal = animal;
/* animal Not a pure module */
```
